verbs.description: For some reason , the president ’s lawyer Emmet T. Flood [V: was] invited to an intelligence briefing on the role an FBI informant played in the probe into Trump ’s campaign .

[ARGM-CAU: For some reason] , [ARG1: the president ’s lawyer Emmet T. Flood] was [V: invited] [ARG2: to an intelligence briefing on the role an FBI informant played in the probe into Trump ’s campaign] .

For some reason , the president ’s lawyer Emmet T. Flood was invited to an intelligence briefing on [ARG1: the role] [ARG0: an FBI informant] [V: played] [ARGM-LOC: in the probe into Trump ’s campaign] .
